author: rdonkin
msg: Improvements to WeakHashTable. Values are now held with hard references and a reference queue is polled during a purge. Contributed by Brian Stansberry.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added code to purge entries who references have been collected. Test contributed by Brian Stansberry.

author: rdonkin
msg: Updated WeakHashtable so that the null handling symantics match the superclass. Unit test contributed by Brian Stansberry.

author: rdonkin
msg: LogFactory's Hashtable implementation (used to store LogFactoryImpl by classloader) can now be subclassed. This will default to WeakHashtable when this is present on the classpath, Hashtable otherwise. The implementation class can be specified by a system property. Based on a contribution by Brian Stansberry.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added new optional subcomponent consisting of non-core implementations. Initial contents MemoryLog, a log implementation intended for use when unit testing. Issue #27663. Contributed by Joerg Schaible.
